title: For purpose of existing "Carpet area"/ rehabilitation “carpet area” means the net usable floor area
clause_text: For purpose of existing "Carpet area"/ rehabilitation “carpet area” means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per then/prevailing Regulation but including the areas of balcony if allowed free of FSI as per then Regulation
